Uses of Class
bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.model.Booking

Packages that use Booking
Package
Description
bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.commands
Contains command classes implementing the Command pattern for various flight booking operations.
bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.model
Defines the core domain models for the flight booking system.
bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.test
Contains unit tests and test utilities for the flight booking system.
